quest: The leader of the Opposition appoints senior opposition MPs to be what?
quest_zh: 反對派的領導人任命高級反對黨議員是什麼？

quest: People of the Iron Age sometimes defended sites. What were these sites?
quest_zh: 鐵器時代的人們有時為地點辯護。這些網站是什麼？

quest: Who was John Constable?
quest_zh: 誰是約翰·康斯特布爾？

answers.answer: An important contributor to the 'pop art' movement of the 1960s
answers.answer_zh: 1960年代“波普藝術”運動的重要貢獻者

answers.answer: A Welsh artist, best known for his engravings and stained glass
answers.answer_zh: 威爾士藝術家，以其版畫和彩色玻璃而聞名

answers.answer: A very successful Northern Irish portrait painter
answers.answer_zh: 一個非常成功的北愛爾蘭肖像畫家

answers.answer: A landscape painter, most famous for his works of Dedham Vale on the Suffolk-Essex border in the East of England
answers.answer_zh: 景觀畫家，以他在英格蘭東部的薩福克 - 埃塞克斯邊境上的迪德姆谷作品而聞名

quest: What is the name given to the conflict between those wishing for full Irish independence and those wishing to remain loyal to the UK government?
quest_zh: 那些希望擁有全面愛爾蘭獨立的人與希望忠於英國政府的人之間的衝突是什麼？

quest: The people of the Bronze Age were accomplished glassworkers
quest_zh: 青銅時代的人是有成就的玻璃工人

quest: Where can you get details about the small claims procedure?
quest_zh: 您在哪裡可以獲得有關小額索賠程序的詳細信息？

quest: There are charities which may help people who cannot afford to pay for a vet
quest_zh: 有些慈善機構可能會幫助那些負擔不起獸醫費用的人

quest: When did hereditary peers lose the automatic right to attend the House of Lords?
quest_zh: 世襲同齡人甚麼時候失去了參加上議院的自動權利？

quest: Where are the more serious civil cases dealt with in Scotland?
quest_zh: 蘇格蘭更嚴重的民事案件在哪裡？

quest: You can find copies of Hansard report in large libraries and on the Internet
quest_zh: 您可以在大型圖書館和互聯網上找到Hansard報告的副本

quest: English laws and the English language were introduced in Wales by the middle of which century?
quest_zh: 英語法律和英語是在哪個世紀中葉在威爾士引入的？

quest: On election day, you will get your ballot paper, which you take to a polling booth to fill in front of the polling officer
quest_zh: 在選舉日，您將獲得投票紙，然後將其帶到投票站，以填補投票官的面前

quest: What will happen to any driver who has either taken more than the acceptable quantity of alcohol or refused to take the test?
quest_zh: 任何服用比可接受數量的酒精或拒絕接受測試的駕駛員會發生什麼？

quest: Who developed ideas about economics during the Enlightenment period which are still referred to today?
quest_zh: 誰在今天仍提到的啟蒙時期發展了有關經濟學的想法？

quest: Hanukkah is celebrated to remember the Jews' struggle for religious freedom and it is in November or December for how many days?
quest_zh: 慶祝光明節記得猶太人爭取宗教自由的鬥爭，而在11月或12月持續了幾天？

quest: The Prime Minister is the head of the Commonwealth
quest_zh: 總理是英聯邦的負責人

quest: In what year was Germany comprehensively defeated by the Allies during the WWII?
quest_zh: 第二次世界大戰期間，德國在哪一年被盟友全面擊敗？

quest: What is the capital of Wales?
quest_zh: 威爾士的首都是什麼？

quest: Which of the options given below is not necessary for a new car?
quest_zh: 新車不需要以下哪些選項？

quest: After the Black Death, a new social class appeared, – owners of large areas of land. What were they called?
quest_zh: 黑人死亡後，出現了一個新的社會階層，這是大片土地的所有者。他們叫什麼？

quest: Who was the monarch when the Book of Common Prayer was written to be used in the Church of England?
quest_zh: 在英格蘭教會中寫了《普通祈禱書》時，誰是君主？

quest: What percentage of the UK population lives in England?
quest_zh: 英國人口中有多少百分比居住在英國？

quest: Until what time do people play jokes on one another on April Fool's Day?
quest_zh: 直到四月愚人節，人們什麼時候玩笑話？

quest: One TV licence covers all of the equipment at one address, but people who rent different rooms in a shared house must buy a separate TV licence
quest_zh: 一個電視許可證涵蓋了一個地址的所有設備，但是在共享房屋中租用不同房間的人必須購買單獨的電視許可證
